phrs.translation: n. 马克·吐温（美国小说家）

sentences.sentence: Twain was an admirable figure comparable to Abraham Lincoln.
sentences.translation: 吐温是个令人钦佩的人物，可以与亚伯拉罕·林肯相提并论。

sentences.sentence: Pablo Picasso, Charles Darwin, Mark Twain, Oliver Goldsmith, and William Butler Yeats all disliked school.
sentences.translation: 巴勃罗·毕加索、查尔斯·达尔文、马克·吐温、奥利弗·戈德史密斯和威廉·巴特勒·叶芝都不喜欢上学。

sentences.sentence: It was written by Mark Twain.
